aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: User defined list of usage with percentage, driving style, eniviroment (hilliness, city_use, trailer_use)
Vehicle status is basically described by mileage and age
Basic technical data of the vehicle as specified in KBA data
The future scenario cotains one or more future usage profiles where the sum of percentage is 100
Future scenario: collection of usage profiles
User defined list of usage with percentage, driving style, eniviroment (hilliness, city_use, trailer_use)

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: User defined list of usage with percentage, driving style, eniviroment (hilliness, city_use, trailer_use)
Distance the vehicle has travelled in kilometre
Age of the vehicle in month
Current status of vehicle: age, mileage
Vehicle variant - body shapes like SUV, Van, Limousine
Identification of 4WD, default 1: 2WD
The code for the energy source respectively fuel type of the vehicle according to KBA list
Engine power is the power that an engine can put out in kW
Technical permissable maximum weight of the vehicle in kg
Basic technical data of the vehicle
Weighfactor of the different profiles, a user has. Different profiles indicates different user as well as different usages of like profiles for daily work routes or for caravan holiday.
Usage of trailer like caravan.
City driving means a short distances.
Numerical value between 1 and 100 describing the driving style. 1 for extreme economic driving, about 30 for normal driving, about 65 for sportive driving, 100 for aggressive driving.
Numerical value between 1 and 100 to describe the hilliness. 1: absolut flat region, 100 steep mountain roads
Numerical value between 1 and 100 describing the curviness (1: straight road ... 100: very curvy road.
User profiles of previous use
Numerical value between 1 and 100 describing the curviness (1: straight road ... 100: very curvy road.
Numerical value between 1 and 100 to describe the hilliness. 1: absolut flat region, 100 steep mountain roads
